channel.title: Prospero
channel.description:
prospero was one of valve original games that never got realaesed, it was in develoupment wehn Half-Life 1 was being made too, but they cancelled it because they had to scrape Half-Life and start over. I personally think that that game had great potential, espically with a girl being the main charactor, i think that it would have been a cool new approch for VALVe, now prospero may have all ready been made with portal, but i think that they should make prospero and use that name and acctully make a FPS, espically with it being like myst, that would have been one hell of a game
keyword for google if you dont know what im talking about is: prospero valve

item.title: Prospero
item.dc:creator: Combine
item.description:
Seems to be a growing habit of posting random thoughts on the forum.

Aside from getting a headache from reading typo after typo, I agree a Myst-like game from Valve would have been very nice. Way to relax and wander around.

Read full topic

item.title: Prospero
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Propsero’s Book… Worst. Movie. Ever.

The play is pretty horrible as well.

Never head of the game, though.

item.title: Prospero
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
blow away windbag, let him meme for goodness sake.

at OP, interesting from what I could make out, but surely there is a spell checker somewhere on you computer? I don’t mind a few spelling mistakes, I make them all the time but… seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: Prospero
item.dc:creator: Fellow_Scientist
item.description:
Clearly you’ve seen this over-used meme posted before, and wanted to jump on the train and find the first excuse to post it that you could. Way to be irrelevant and unoriginal. A pity you’re a few years late to the party, and couldn’t come up with something yourself.

OP - cheers for the info, I’d heard the name associated with Valve before but forgotten about it. Another page in Valves history.

Read full topic
